derivation: from a derivative of G450 (ἀναστατόω) (in the sense of removal);
kjv_def: trouble, turn upside down, make an uproar
strongs_def: properly, to drive out of home, i.e. (by implication) to disturb (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. to stir up, excite, unsettle
    1. to excite tumults and seditions in the state
    2. to upset, unsettle, minds by disseminating religious error
